name: Rajiv Patel
learned: Rajiv Patel is a painter who wants live quietly and paint while enjoying his everyday life.
currently: Rajiv Patel is preparing for his first solo show. He mostly works from the artists' co-living space. Also, he recently got into playing the guitar.
lifestyle: Rajiv Patel goes to bed around midnight, awakes up around 9am, eats dinner around 5pm.
living_area: the Ville:artist's co-living space:Rajiv Patel's room
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 9:00 am
Start painting for his solo show from 10:00 am to 1:00 pm
Take a break for lunch at 1:00 pm
Continue painting from 2:00 pm to 5:00 pm
Practice playing the guitar from 5:00 pm to 6:00 pm
Spend some time relaxing and watching TV from 7:00 pm to 8:00 pm
